amendment.description: Amendment requires that funds expended under the bill must be in conformance with the Buy American Act; and provides for the debarment of persons convicted of the fraudulent use of "Made in America" labels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require compliance with the Buy American Act and provide for the debarment of persons convicted of fraudulent use of "Made in America" labels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
